answerText: Mohs scale of mineral hardness[10] This material, a 7 on the Mohs scale, also occupies the lowest position in both Bowen's reaction series and the Goldich dissolution series, meaning it is relatively stable at the surface.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 4 | 4 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Under this classification scheme, scratching is defined as the creation of visible, non-elastic deformations.  [10] Name this scale of mineral hardness, on which talc ranks as 1 and diamond ranks as 10, and intermediate minerals are ranked by their ability to scratch other, softer minerals.
